introduction: SYNOPSISJi-ae is a pretty but naive college student from the countryside. She rescues a mysterious young man named Ji-lip at a rest stop, and later runs into him again and falls for him in a group blind date. But Ji-ae who is popular with the older generation is tempted by them for her beauty. Ji-lip denies reality and begins to roam putting their relationship to the test. Ji-ae meets Yoo-jin who possesses fame and fortune and loses her virginity to him but is also helped by him. Ji-ae gets a taste of high society and begins to yearn for the life of privilege and luxury. But her love for Ji-lip puts her into a state of turmoil. Ji-lip comes back to her one day and asks for her forgiveness. But they both realize that they are not right for each other and go their separate ways.故事这个国家的妻子是一个美丽的女学生，天真无邪。她在毕业的途中，在一个安静的地方救了一个书呆子的年轻人，再次见面，彼此相爱。但是，由于她的美丽，智慧被老一代所诱惑，杰普拒绝了现实。他们互相争斗，而且智爱对有钱有荣的尤金失去了贞操，并得到了他的帮助。与此同时，由于想要增加她心中隐藏的地位，面对上层社会的严重性，面临着内在严重性的真相，寻求宽恕，徐正在寻求宽恕和确认爱情，但是他认识到两个人不应该相爱并分手。
